Contents.Content: select br.bz, --0门诊 1住院 br.patid, --病人编号 br.hzxm, --病人姓名 br.sex, --性别 br.birth, --出生日期 br.sfzh, --身份证号 br.lxdz, --联系地址 br.lxdh, --电话 br.gwbz, --是否高危 zy.blh, --住院号 zy.bqdm, --病区 zy.cwdm, --床位 zy.cwhs, --床位护士 zy.patid --病人编号 from JBXX br left join ZYXX zy on br.patid=zy.patid where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 br.patid as VALUE,--病人编号 br.patid as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.hzxm as NAME, --病人姓名 br.hzxm as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.birth as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.birth,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 --住院信息 zy.blh as SocialSecurityCard, --住院号 zy.bqdm as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.cwdm as BEDNO, --床位 zy.cwhs as BEDNURSE --床位护士 from Infecon_brjbxx br left join Infecon_zyxx zy on br.patid=zy.patid where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.patid as VALUE,--病人编号 br.hzxm as NAME, --病人姓名 br.hzxm as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.birth as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.birth,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.blh as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.sss as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.ks as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.aprq as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.ssys as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.ssmc as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from Infecon_ssxx ss inner join Infecon_brjbxx br on ss.patid=br.patid inner join Infecon_zyxx zy on br.patid=zy.patid where 1=1 {0}

select br.bz, --0门诊 1住院 br.patid, --病人编号 br.hzxm, --病人姓名 br.sex, --性别 br.birth, --出生日期 br.sfzh, --身份证号 br.lxdz, --联系地址 br.lxdh, --电话 br.gwbz, --是否高危 gh.xh, --挂号系统编号 gh.ghlb, --0普通门诊，急诊 gh.ghrq, --挂号日期 gh.ksdm, --挂号科室 gh.ghhx, --挂号号 gh.patid --病人编号 from JBXX br left join GHXX gh on br.patid=gh.patid where 1=1 {0} order by gh.ghrq Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.patid as VALUE,--病人编号 br.hzxm as NAME, --病人姓名 br.hzxm as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.sex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.birth as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(br.birth,1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 gh.xh as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.ghlb as OUTPATIENTEMERGENCY,--挂号类型 gh.ghrq as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.ghhx as REGISTERNUMBER, --挂号序号 gh.ksdm as REGISTERDEPARTMENT --挂号科室 from Infecon_ghxx gh left join Infecon_brjbxx br on gh.patid=br.patid where 1=1 {0} order by gh.ghrq Desc
